com.github.macgregor.alexandria.exceptions

Class HttpException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.io.IOException
          • com.github.macgregor.alexandria.exceptions.AlexandriaException
            • com.github.macgregor.alexandria.exceptions.HttpException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class HttpException
extends AlexandriaException
    Exception used when making Http requests in the Remote.

    In addition to the Config.DocumentMetadata context you get from AlexandriaException, this also contains the Request and Response objects when the error was triggered.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Builder class to help create HttpException in a more fluent way.
